prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Pavol is a developer specializing in creating functional user applications using the latest AI models. He is a member of the Ainautes consulting group, which supports the deployment of generative AI globally.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Pavol, developer, functional user applications, AI models, Ainautes, consulting group, generative AI, deployment
